name: Bun Forest
description:
Bun Forest is a short game made in 3D Game Dev with  small group. In this forest, you are set to protect your fortress from a never ending horde of mad bunnies. You must shoot them before they destroy the door and break in. 

Credits:

Sam Gomes: Level Design, Environmental Art, 3D Modeling

Lucas Remington: Production

AJ Marraffa: 3D Modeling, Level Design

Maxim: Programming
